body_html:
Had the same error in a Google Cloud Tesla K80 instance. Solution was to simply leave the 'num_workers' parameter away!
dataloader_train = torch.utils.data.DataLoader(train_dataset, batch_size=64, shuffle=True) #, num_workers=2)
body_text:
Had the same error in a Google Cloud Tesla K80 instance. Solution was to simply leave the 'num_workers' parameter away!
dataloader_train = torch.utils.data.DataLoader(train_dataset, batch_size=64, shuffle=True) #, num_workers=2)
body:
Had the same error in a Google Cloud Tesla K80 instance. Solution was to simply leave the 'num_workers' parameter away!
`dataloader_train = torch.utils.data.DataLoader(train_dataset, batch_size=64, shuffle=True) #, num_workers=2)`
